item.title: The SML offers a warm welcome to our newest PhD student, Mandy Luo (@ManxiLuo)! Mandy studies how technology mediation affects the effectiveness of persuasive messages and how people form trust in machine communicators. Welcome to the lab and welcome to Cornell!
item.description: The SML offers a warm welcome to our newest PhD student, Mandy Luo (@ManxiLuo)! Mandy studies how technology mediation affects the effectiveness of persuasive messages and how people form trust in machine communicators. Welcome to the lab and welcome to Cornell!

item.title: üéâ Congratulations to SML Ph.D. student @bae_inhwan on receiving the 2024-25 PCCW Frank H.T. Rhodes Mission Grant! üåü Her project focuses on combating online toxicity against women and nonbinary persons with tailored persuasion messages using large language models.

item.title: SML members @bae_inhwan @isabellemcdaph @haesooheatherk and Julia Sebastien had a lovely meeting with the students @btf_bluetree about youth social media safety! It was great to chat, @ParkChanJun_ , thank you for inviting us! #bluetreefoundation

item.title: We are excited to welcome Han Li, @HanLi_1231 to SML! Han joined our collaborative project on "Deterring Objectionable Behaviors Online," socialsciences.cornell.edu/deterring-obje‚Ä¶¬† She comes to us after her postdoc at the NUS where she worked with Dr. Renwen Zhang (@renwenzhang).
